Name: Orange Top Mount
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
I leave the tangy citrusy scents of oranges in my wake. This orange top enables you to double-jump and move at a considerably fast speed.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
I leave the tangy citrusy scents of oranges in my wake. This orange top enables you to double-jump and move at a considerably fast speed. Double-click your destination on the World Map and you will automatically fly toward it along the navigation route. (Auto flight is available only on certain continents, including Victoria Island. You can expand your Smart Mount-permitted continents by buying Flight Permits from Instructor Irvin.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
I leave the tangy citrusy scents of oranges in my wake. This orange top enables you to double-jump and move at a considerably fast speed.

H.Old: DEF: +10, MSPD: 170, Auto Pilot MSPD: Very Fast, Jump: 120

h1.Old: DEF: +10, MSPD: 170, Auto Pilot MSPD: Very Fast, Jump: 120
